recipesJson.name: Crazy crunch
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: This is spot on  crunch  berries I'm done trying to mix this recipe it's  tasty as it is just thought I would share it....yes the sweetener is high but it's a sugary cereal and Purilum super sweet is the best IMO.

reviews.text: This is a pretty nice recipe! Very well balanced I must say! Thank you! Good moisture level (i.e., not dry). You get the fruits on the background, both on the inhale and the exhale. They blend very nicely with the crunchy elements and the almond. All in all, a very good balance of taste.
